findings.title: Non-compliance with Solidity naming conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity style guide, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: Incomplete event implementation
findings.description: The contract is missing required events, which can cause issues with arithmetic operations.

findings.title: Uninitialized variables
findings.description: The contract uses variables before they are declared, leading to unexpected behavior and potential errors.

findings.title: Uninitialized local variables
findings.description: The contract uses uninitialized local variables, leading to unpredictable behavior and potential errors.

findings.title: Insecure variable configuration
findings.description: The contract performs operations on user-supplied input without proper checks, leading to potential issues.

findings.title: Insecure transfer methods
findings.description: The contract does not check if transfer methods are successful, potentially leading to incorrect assumptions.
